Class STCProperty

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.stc.STCProperty
Direct Known Subclasses:
ControlProperty, FaultProperty, ResetProperty, StatusProperty, VersionProperty
public abstract class STCProperty extends ControllerProperty
A property which can be sent or received from a controller.
Author:
Douglas Lau
